home_title: A place where time stands still
home_subtitle: Escape the routine and live a unique experience in El Calafate, Argentina. Our boutique hotel invites you to discover an exclusive retreat at the gateway to the majestic Perito Moreno Glacier. Surrounded by dreamlike landscapes, here you’ll find a space where tranquility and comfort combine to enrich your senses. Immerse yourself in the Patagonian beauty, enjoy the warmth of our hospitality, and let yourself be carried away by the charm of a destination that blends nature, history, and luxury.
home_subtitle2: Your boutique refuge in El Calafate awaits!
roomsCarousel_subtitle: Designed for your comfort and style
discover_ayres: Discover Ayres with all the comforts
home_discover_text: Escape the routine and live a unique experience in El Calafate, Argentina. Our boutique hotel invites you to discover an exclusive retreat at the gateway to the majestic Perito Moreno Glacier. Surrounded by dreamlike landscapes, here you’ll find a space where tranquility and comfort combine to enrich your senses. Immerse yourself in the Patagonian beauty, enjoy the warmth of our hospitality, and let yourself be carried away by the charm of a destination that blends nature, history, and luxury.
spa_imagetext2: Perfect Place to Enjoy Your Life
spa_subtitle: Breathe deeply, relax, and enjoy a unique experience.
spa_text: At Ayres de Calafate, every spa experience is designed to renew body, mind, and spirit. We use regional essential oils, techniques inspired by Patagonian nature, and an atmosphere that invites relaxation and balance.
hour_spa_text: Indoor pool and spa, every day from 6:00 PM to 8:00 PM.
treatment_1_text: A ritual that combines gentle massage techniques with the therapeutic energy of lavender, an ancient plant of high frequency. It promotes deep relaxation, relieves stress and anxiety, and encourages restorative rest. The combination of slow, soft, and deep movements releases physical and mental tension, restoring balance and overall well-being.
treatment_2_text: Designed for those exploring Patagonia on foot. This massage relieves tiredness and heaviness in the legs, improving circulation through the application of cold gel and mint essential oil. It provides an immediate sensation of freshness, lightness, and renewal. Duration: 30 minutes.
treatment_3_text: A holistic massage that integrates body, mind, emotions, and spirit. Through deep synchronized movements, aromas of regional essential oils, and enveloping sounds, the energy centers (chakras) are balanced, and physical and mental tension is released. A sensory experience that invites connection and deep relaxation.
contact_text: We’ll be happy to help you.
name: Name
answ1: Guests under 18 years old cannot make reservations without the intervention of an adult. Children up to 3 years old can share a room with their parents, with a maximum of two children per room. Regarding pets, at the moment our property is not adapted to accommodate them, so we do not offer a Pet Friendly option.
answ2: Check-in starts at 2:00 PM, while check-out must be completed before 10:00 AM. Breakfast is included in the rate and is served from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM. Our pool is available for guests to enjoy from 10:00 AM until midnight. In addition, we have a Pool Bar where you can enjoy drinks, beverages, empanadas, and toasted sandwiches in a relaxed atmosphere. The bar is open daily from 6:00 PM to 11:00 PM.
answ3: All our rooms include amenities such as shampoo, conditioner, and soap. Cleaning service is included in your stay, ensuring a fresh and comfortable environment during your visit. If you wish to enjoy the pool, you can request exclusive towels for this area at the reception.
answ4: If you want to explore the surroundings, El Calafate offers numerous options within a short distance from the hotel. Just a few minutes on foot, you can walk along Paseo del Bosque, a trail surrounded by lenga and ñire trees that connects you with Patagonian nature. You can also visit the Glaciarium, a top-level glaciological interpretation center where you will learn everything about the region's glaciers. For shopping and souvenir lovers, the shopping area on Avenida del Libertador is just a few steps away and stays open late with artisanal shops and chocolatiers. If you're looking for a different experience, you can cruise on Lake Argentino or take a trip to the Perito Moreno Glacier, located only 80 kilometers from downtown. And when you return, relax in our pool open until midnight or enjoy a selection of cocktails, empanadas, and smoothies at our Pool Bar, open from 6:00 PM to 11:00 PM.
footer_desc: Ayres de Calafate is a boutique hotel in the heart of El Calafate, offering comfortable rooms, personalized service, and a unique Patagonian experience.
